name: IncentOne
overview: IncentOne provides integrated incentive administration solutions to health plans, payers, health partners, brokers, governments, pharma, and employers. It offers health and productivity solutions, including the Healthy Choice Award, a solution for rewarding a single health activity, such as health risk assessments; and Health Power, an integrated points solution that rewards multiple health activities. The company also provides Employee Choice Award, a solution for rewarding employees for a single event; and Employee Power, an integrated pointâ€™s solution that rewards employees for multiple activities. In addition, IncentOne integrates various reward and incentive programs into a single solution to align employee behavior with various business objectives; and provides financial services. Further, it offers Sales Performance Award, which provides rewards for sales people for single activities, such as winning a sales contest; and Sales Power, which is an integrated and comprehensive solution that tracks and rewards sales professionals for ongoing sales performance with a cumulative points-based system. Furthermore, the company provides Customer Choice Award, which offers solution for rewarding customers for single activities; and Customer Power, which is an integrated and comprehensive solution that tracks and rewards customers for multiple transactions with a cumulative loyalty points-based system. It offers a reward catalog that consists of gift certificates, merchandise, travel packages, entertainment, foods, and phone cards. IncentOne was formerly known as 1 800 GIFT CERTIFICATE and changed its name to IncentOne in September 2003. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Lyndhurst, New Jersey.

funding_rounds.source_description: IncentOne Completes Undisclosed Second Round of Financing
